016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.client;
017
018import com.codahale.metrics.Histogram;
019import com.codahale.metrics.Meter;
020import com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.api.DnsLookup;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ClientConfiguration;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.server.ServerShutdownStreamException;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.server.ServerStreamException;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageWriter;
027import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
028import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
029import org.apache.logging.log4j.Marker;
030import org.apache.logging.log4j.MarkerManager;
031import org.eclipse.jetty.io.ByteBufferOutputStream2;
032import org.eclipse.jetty.io.ByteBufferPool;
033import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session;
034import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.StatusCode;
035import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.WebSocketListener;
036import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.WriteCallback;
037import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.client.WebSocketClient;
038import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
039import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
040import org.reactivestreams.Subscription;
041
042import java.io.IOException;
043import java.net.URI;
044import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
045import java.nio.channels.ClosedChannelException;
046import java.time.Duration;
047import java.util.ArrayDeque;
048import java.util.Deque;
049import java.util.Iterator;
050import java.util.List;
051import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
052import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
053import java.util.function.Supplier;
054
055/**
056 * @author rickardoberg
057 */
058public class PublishReactiveStream
059        implements WebSocketListener,
060        WriteCallback,
061        Subscriber<Object> {
062
063    private final static Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(PublishReactiveStream.class);
064
065    private final WebSocketClient webSocketClient;
066    private final DnsLookup dnsLookup;
067    protected final ByteBufferPool pool;
068    protected final MessageWriter<Object> eventWriter;
069
070    private final ClientConfiguration publisherConfiguration;
071    private final Supplier<Configuration> subscriberConfiguration;
072    protected final CompletableFuture<Void> result;
073    protected final Marker marker;
074
075    protected final Meter sent;
076    protected final Meter sentBytes;
077    protected final Histogram sentBatchSize;
078    protected final Histogram requestsHistogram;
079    private final long maxBatchSize = 4096;
080    protected long batchSize;
081
082    private boolean redundancyNotificationIssued = false;
083
084    private final URI serverUri;
085    private final String streamName;
086    private final Publisher<Object> publisher;
087
088    // All the state which requires synchronized access to session
089    protected Session session;
090    private Iterator<URI> uriIterator;
091    protected Subscription subscription;
092    private final Deque<Object> queue = new ArrayDeque<>();
093    protected final ByteBufferOutputStream2 outputStream;
094    private long requested = 0;
095    private ByteBuffer eventBuffer;
096    private Object item;
097
098    protected boolean isSending = false;
099    protected boolean isComplete = false;
100    protected boolean isRetrying = false;
101    private long retryDelay;
102
103    public PublishReactiveStream(URI serverUri,
104                                 String streamName,
105                                 ClientConfiguration publisherConfiguration,
106                                 DnsLookup dnsLookup,
107                                 WebSocketClient webSocketClient,
108                                 Publisher<Object> publisher,
109                                 MessageWriter<Object> eventWriter,
110                                 Supplier<Configuration> subscriberConfiguration,
111                                 ByteBufferPool pool,
112                                 MetricRegistry metricRegistry,
113                                 CompletableFuture<Void> result) {
114        this.serverUri = serverUri;
115        this.streamName = streamName;
116        this.publisherConfiguration = publisherConfiguration;
117        this.dnsLookup = dnsLookup;
118        this.webSocketClient = webSocketClient;
119        this.publisher = publisher;
120        this.eventWriter = eventWriter;
121        this.subscriberConfiguration = subscriberConfiguration;
122        this.pool = pool;
123        this.result = result;
124        this.retryDelay = Duration.parse("PT" + publisherConfiguration.getRetryDelay()).toMillis();
125        this.marker = MarkerManager.getMarker(serverUri.getAuthority() + "/" + streamName);
126        this.sent = metricRegistry.meter("publish." + streamName + ".sent");
127        this.sentBytes = metricRegistry.meter("publish." + streamName + ".sent.bytes");
128        this.sentBatchSize = metricRegistry.histogram("publish." + streamName + ".sent.batchsize");
129        this.requestsHistogram = metricRegistry.histogram("publish." + streamName + ".requests");
130        this.outputStream = new ByteBufferOutputStream2(pool, true);
131
132        // Client completed
133        result.whenComplete(this::resultComplete);
134
135        start();
136    }
137
138    private synchronized void resultComplete(Void result, Throwable throwable) {
139        if (!isComplete) {
140            isComplete = true;
141            send();
142        }
143    }
144
145    // Connection process
146    public synchronized void start() {
147        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
148            logger.trace(marker, "start");
149        }
150
151        if (result.isDone()) {
152            return;
153        }
154
155        if (!webSocketClient.isStarted()) {
156            retry(null);
157        }
158
159        if (serverUri.getScheme().equals("srv")) {
160            logger.debug(marker, "Resolving " + serverUri);
161            dnsLookup.resolve(serverUri).thenApply(list ->
162            {
163                this.uriIterator = list.iterator();
164                return uriIterator;
165            }).thenAccept(this::connect).exceptionally(this::connectException);
166        } else {
167            this.uriIterator = List.of(serverUri).iterator();
168            connect(uriIterator);
169        }
170    }
171
172    private synchronized void connect(Iterator<URI> subscriberURIs) {
173        if (subscriberURIs.hasNext()) {
174            URI subscriberWebsocketUri = subscriberURIs.next();
175
176            if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
177                logger.trace(marker, "connect {}", subscriberWebsocketUri);
178            }
179
180            URI effectiveSubscriberWebsocketUri = URI.create(subscriberWebsocketUri.getScheme() + "://" + subscriberWebsocketUri.getAuthority() + "/streams/subscribers/" + streamName);
181            logger.debug(marker, "Trying " + effectiveSubscriberWebsocketUri);
182            try {
183                webSocketClient.connect(this, effectiveSubscriberWebsocketUri)
184                        .thenAccept(this::connected)
185                        .exceptionally(this::connectException);
186            } catch (Throwable e) {
187                logger.error(marker, "Could not subscribe to " + effectiveSubscriberWebsocketUri.toASCIIString(), e);
188                retry(e);
189            }
190        } else {
191            retry(null);
192        }
193    }
194
195    private void connected(Session session) {
196        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
197            logger.trace(marker, "connected");
198        }
199        this.session = session;
200        this.isRetrying = false;
201    }
202
203    private synchronized Void connectException(Throwable throwable) {
204        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
205            logger.trace(marker, "connectException", throwable);
206        }
207
208        retry(throwable);
209        return null;
210    }
211
212    // Subscriber
213    // These calls come from the upstream client publisher
214    @Override
215    public synchronized void onSubscribe(Subscription subscription) {
216        // Session is already synchronized by onWebsocketText
217        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
218            logger.trace(marker, "onSubscribe");
219        }
220        this.subscription = subscription;
221    }
222
223    @Override
224    public synchronized void onNext(Object item) {
225        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
226//            logger.trace(marker, "onNext {}", item.toString());
227        }
228        if (isComplete)
229            return;
230
231        queue.offer(item);
232
233        if (!isSending)
234            send();
235    }
236
237    @Override
238    public synchronized void onError(Throwable throwable) {
239        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
240            logger.trace(marker, "onError", throwable);
241        }
242
243        if (!result.isDone()) {
244            if (throwable instanceof ServerStreamException) {
245                // This should basically never happen
246                session.close(StatusCode.SERVER_ERROR, throwable.getMessage());
247            } else {
248                session.close(StatusCode.NORMAL, throwable.getMessage());
249            }
250            result.completeExceptionally(throwable);
251        }
252    }
253
254    public synchronized void onComplete() {
255        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
256            logger.trace(marker, "onComplete");
257        }
258
259        isComplete = true;
260        if (!isSending)
261            send();
262        logger.debug(marker, "Waiting for outstanding events to be sent to {}", session.getRemote().getRemoteAddress());
263    }
264
265    // Whoever calls this should have a synchronized on the session, if available
266    public synchronized void retry(Throwable cause) {
267
268        if (isComplete) {
269            if (!result.isDone() && !isSending) {
270                result.complete(null);
271            }
272        }
273
274        if (result.isDone() || isRetrying) {
275            return;
276        }
277
278        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
279            logger.trace(marker, "retry");
280        }
281
282        if (publisherConfiguration.isRetryEnabled() && publisherConfiguration.isRetryable(cause)) {
283
284            if (!isRetrying) {
285                logger.debug(marker, "Reconnecting");
286                isRetrying = true;
287            }
288
289            // Reset state
290            requested = 0;
291
292            if (uriIterator.hasNext()) {
293                connect(uriIterator);
294            } else {
295                if (cause instanceof ServerShutdownStreamException) {
296                    retryDelay = 0;
297                }
298                CompletableFuture.delayedExecutor(retryDelay, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS).execute(this::start);
299                // Exponential backoff, gets reset on successful connect, max 60s delay
300                retryDelay = Math.min(retryDelay * 2, 60000);
301            }
302        } else {
303            isComplete = true;
304            if (subscription != null) {
305                subscription.cancel();
306            }
307
308            if (cause == null)
309                result.complete(null);
310            else
311                result.completeExceptionally(cause);
312        }
313    }
314
315    // WebSocket
316    @Override
317    public synchronized void onWebSocketConnect(Session session) {
318
319        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
320            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketConnect {}", session.getRemoteAddress().toString());
321        }
322
323        if (isRetrying) {
324            logger.debug(marker, "Reconnected");
325            isRetrying = false;
326        }
327
328        this.requested = 0;
329        this.session = session;
330        this.retryDelay = Duration.parse("PT" + publisherConfiguration.getRetryDelay()).toMillis();
331
332        // First send parameters, if available
333        String parameterString = subscriberConfiguration.get().json().toPrettyString();
334        session.getRemote().sendString(parameterString, new WriteCallbackCompletableFuture(new CompletableFuture<>()
335                .thenAccept(Void ->
336                {
337                    logger.info(marker, "Connected to {}", session.getUpgradeRequest().getRequestURI());
338                }).exceptionally(t ->
339                {
340                    session.close(StatusCode.SERVER_ERROR, t.getMessage());
341                    logger.error(marker, "Parameter handshake failed", t);
342                    return null;
343                })));
344    }
345
346    @Override
347    public synchronized void onWebSocketText(String message) {
348        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
349            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketText {}", message);
350        }
351
352        long requestAmount = Long.parseLong(message);
353
354        if (requestAmount == Long.MIN_VALUE) {
355            logger.debug(marker, "Received cancel on websocket");
356            session.close(StatusCode.NORMAL, "cancel");
357
358            // Maybe try another subscriber
359            retry(new ServerShutdownStreamException("cancel"));
360        } else {
361            if (subscription == null) {
362                publisher.subscribe(this);
363            }
364
365            requestsHistogram.update(requestAmount);
366            requested += requestAmount;
367            subscription.request(requestAmount);
368
369            if (!isSending)
370                send();
371        }
372    }
373
374    @Override
375    public synchronized void onWebSocketBinary(byte[] payload, int offset, int len) {
376
377        if (!redundancyNotificationIssued) {
378            logger.warn(marker, "Receiving redundant results from subscriber");
379            redundancyNotificationIssued = true;
380        }
381    }
382
383    @Override
384    public synchronized void onWebSocketError(Throwable cause) {
385
386        if (cause instanceof ClosedChannelException) {
387            // Ignore
388            return;
389        }
390
391        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
392            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketError", cause);
393        }
394    }
395
396    @Override
397    public synchronized void onWebSocketClose(int statusCode, String reason) {
398        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
399            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketClose {} {}", statusCode, reason);
400        }
401
402        if (statusCode == StatusCode.NORMAL) {
403            logger.debug(marker, "Session closed:{} {}", statusCode, reason);
404            result.complete(null);
405        } else if (statusCode == StatusCode.SHUTDOWN || statusCode == StatusCode.NO_CLOSE) {
406            logger.debug(marker, "Close websocket:{} {}", statusCode, reason);
407            retry(new ServerShutdownStreamException(reason));
408        }
409    }
410
411    protected void send() {
412        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
413            logger.trace(marker, "send {}", isSending);
414        }
415
416        if (requested > 0 && session != null) {
417            item = queue.poll();
418            if (item == null) {
419                isSending = false;
420                checkDone();
421
422                return;
423            }
424
425            isSending = true;
426
427            try {
428                // Write event data
429                if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
430                    logger.trace(marker, "writeEvent {}", item);
431                }
432                writeEvent(item);
433
434                // Send it
435                eventBuffer = outputStream.takeByteBuffer();
436                session.getRemote().sendBytes(eventBuffer, this);
437
438            } catch (Throwable t) {
439                isSending = false;
440                logger.error(marker, "Could not send event", t);
441                connectException(t);
442            }
443        } else {
444            isSending = false;
445            checkDone();
446        }
447    }
448
449    protected void checkDone() {
450        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
451            logger.trace(marker, "checkDone {} {} {}", isComplete, queue.isEmpty(), result.isDone());
452        }
453
454        if (isComplete && queue.isEmpty()) {
455            if (session != null && session.isOpen()) {
456                logger.debug(marker, "Sending complete for session {}", session.getRemote().getRemoteAddress());
457                session.close(StatusCode.NORMAL, "complete");
458            }
459            if (!result.isDone())
460                result.complete(null);
461        }
462    }
463
464    protected void writeEvent(Object item) throws IOException {
465        if (item == null)
466            throw new IOException("Item is null");
467        eventWriter.writeTo(item, outputStream);
468    }
469
470    @Override
471    public synchronized void writeFailed(Throwable t) {
472        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
473            logger.trace(marker, "writeFailed", t);
474        }
475
476        queue.push(item);
477        pool.release(eventBuffer);
478        retry(t);
479    }
480
481    @Override
482    public synchronized void writeSuccess() {
483        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
484            logger.trace(marker, "writeSuccess");
485        }
486
487        sentBytes.mark(eventBuffer.position());
488        pool.release(eventBuffer);
489
490        requested--;
491        batchSize++;
492        if (requested == 0 || queue.isEmpty() || batchSize == maxBatchSize) {
493//                    logger.debug(marker, "doFlush {} {} {}", requested, queue.size(), batchSize);
494            CompletableFuture.runAsync(this::flush);
495        } else {
496            send();
497        }
498    }
499
500    protected synchronized void flush() {
501        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
502            logger.trace(marker, "flush {}", batchSize);
503        }
504        try {
505            session.getRemote().flush();
506
507            sent.mark(batchSize);
508            sentBatchSize.update(batchSize);
509            batchSize = 0;
510            send();
511        } catch (IOException e) {
512            logger.error(marker, "Could not send event", e);
513            retry(e);
514        }
515    }
516}
